credit_line: Interdepartmental transfer from Williams College Archives and Special Collections, Gift of Margaret Howe and Samuel Scoville
title: Two Indian youths on horseback
medium: pen and ink | watercolor | pencil on paper
inscriptions: on verso in pencil: This/this youth to ride on the/horse, and running/awa[illegible]/away/mar 9"/80/Elkman/E.P.H. Ashley
